label: A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-003
title: Ottemannite (Sn$_{2}$S$_{3}$) Structure
comments:
(Kniep, 1982) refer to this as tin(II) tin(IV) trisulphide, while the ICSD labels it Sn(SnS$_{3}$). 
 The ICSD lists \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_oP20_62_c_3c_c-001}{(NH$_{4}$)CdCl$_{3}$ ($E2_{4}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-003}{ottemannite (Sn$_{2}$S$_{3}$} under the structure type NH4CdCl3\#Sn2S3, but we prefer to use different prototypes for the binary and tenary structures. 
 This structure has the same AFLOW label, A3B2\_oP20\_62\_3c\_2c, as \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-001}{stibnite (Sb$_{2}$S$_{3}$, $D5_{8}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-002}{Pt$_{2}$Ge$_{3}$}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
